summary: Following a comprehensive review, a national athletics board has implemented a policy requiring all coaches to undergo mandatory training on mental health awareness and support for athletes.
Two former co-stars have reignited their past romance, as confirmed by a recent joint appearance at a high-profile charity gala.
In an unprecedented move, a major football league has implemented a new policy requiring teams to participate in community service programs that promote environmental awareness.
A famous actor, after a decade-long hiatus, is set to make a comeback with a lead role in an upcoming independent film.
Following a successful comeback, a veteran baseball pitcher has once again retired, this time to focus on writing a memoir about his experiences in the sport.
An unexpected feud has emerged between a leading television host and a famous comedian over remarks made during a late-night talk show segment.
